title: K.DA.1
text: The student will gather and record data with or without a computing device.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Record data and communicate possible patterns

title: K.DA.2
text: The student will create representations of data to make predictions and draw conclusions.
subject: Computer Science (2024)
subs: Create tables, object graphs, picture graphs, and/or models.
Describe the information from a given data visualization.
Use data to answer questions, make predictions, and draw conclusions.
